mapper.update: update prescription set pres_state = 2 where pres_seedo_number = #{param}
update assay set assay_state = 2 where assay_seedo_number = #{param}
update examineorder set exaord_state = 2 where exaord_seedo_number = #{param}
update mzshoushucf set ss_zt = 2 where ss_seedo_number = #{param}
mapper.select: select p.predet_no as id,p.drug_name as name,p.number as count,p.xiaoji as xiaoji from prescriptiondetails p inner join prescription pr on p.predet_pres_no = pr.pres_no where pr.pres_seedo_number = #{param}

select l.labdet_no as id,am.assay_meal_name as name,l.labdet_count as count,l.assay_meal_price as xiaoji from labworkdetails l inner join assay a on a.assay_no = l.labdet_assay_no inner join assay_meal am on am.assay_meal_id = l.assay_meal_id where a.assay_seedo_number = #{param}

select ed.exadet_no as id,am.assay_meal_name as name,ed.exadet_count as count,ed.assay_meal_price as xiaoji from examinedetails ed inner join examineorder e on e.exaord_no = ed.exadet_exaord_no inner join assay_meal am on am.assay_meal_id = ed.assay_meal_id where exaord_seedo_number = #{param}

select x.sq_no as id,s.sur_name as name,x.sq_count as count,x.sur_pay as xiaoji from mzshoushuxq x inner join mzshoushucf c on c.ss_no = x.sq_ss_no inner join sur_item s on x.sur_no = s.sur_no where c.ss_seedo_number = #{param}

select t2.* from ( select s.seedo_number as no,s.seedo_famiroom_name as ks,s.seedo_doctor_name as ys, sum(IFNULL(p.pres_money,0)+IFNULL(a.assay_money,0)+IFNULL(e.exaord_money,0)+IFNULL(m.ss_money,0)) as zjg from seedoctor s left join prescription p on (s.seedo_number = p.pres_seedo_number) and p.pres_state = 1 left join assay a on (s.seedo_number = a.assay_seedo_number) and a.assay_state = 1 left join examineorder e on (s.seedo_number = e.exaord_seedo_number) and e.exaord_state = 1 left join mzshoushucf m on (s.seedo_number = m.ss_seedo_number) and m.ss_zt = 1 inner join patient pa on pa.patient_no = s.seedo_patient_no where 1 = 1 and s.seedo_number = #{param} or pa.patient_idcart = #{param} group by s.seedo_number ) t2 where zjg != 0
